reference.title: Adding new targets to the Ant build process
reference.shortdesc: The Ant conductor extension point is used to make new targets available to the Ant processing pipeline.

dd.p: Add Ant import to main Ant build file.
dd.note: The dita.conductor.target extension is deprecated. Use dita.conductor.target.relative instead.
